title: Rename sidebar menu item from 'Fan Controller Dashboard' to 'Dashboard'

requirements.summary: Change the label of the first menu item in SidebarNav from 'Fan Controller Dashboard' to 'Dashboard'
acceptanceCriteria: The sidebar navigation displays 'Dashboard' as the label for the first menu item.
No other menu item labels are changed.

file_operations.description: Update the label property of the first menu item in the navigation items array from 'Fan Controller Dashboard' to 'Dashboard', ensuring all other menu items and navigation functionality remain unchanged.
